mapper.update: UPDATE tb_chat_room SET chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} WHERE chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId};
mapper.select: SELECT a.chat_room_id, b.user_id, c.username, d.name FROM ( SELECT a.chat_room_id, b.user_id, a.created_at FROM tb_chat_room a JOIN tb_chat_room_user b ON a.chat_room_id = b.chat_room_id AND b.user_id = #{userId}) a JOIN tb_chat_room_user b ON a.chat_room_id = b.chat_room_id AND a.user_id != b.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_user c ON b.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_person d ON b.user_id = d.person_id ORDER BY a.created_at asc
